home_h3_7: Professional maintenance solutions for light and heavy vehicles with quality oils from Germany
home_p_21: Y.N.K logos consulting & Services Ltd specializes in importing car oils to Cyprus directly from the Maximum factory. We provide sales of German car oils of the highest quality, specially adapted to Cypriot road and climate conditions.
home_p_22: Our expertise in oils for light vehicles, heavy vehicles, motorcycles and industry in Cyprus ensures that every vehicle owner receives the exact product for their needs. We understand that proper vehicle maintenance begins with choosing quality oils for vehicles, which is why we offer only products that have undergone rigorous testing and meet international quality standards and those of leading automotive manufacturers worldwide.
home_p_23: Advanced synthetic oils for private cars and SUVs, ensuring maximum engine protection under all driving conditions. Our products meet OEM standards of leading vehicle manufacturers.
home_p_24: Special solutions for trucks, buses and heavy equipment. High-durability oils for heavy loads and harsh working conditions, extending engine life.
home_p_25: Wide range of oils for automatic and manual transmissions, suitable for all vehicle types and ensuring smooth and efficient power transmission.
home_p_26: Essential fluids for vehicle safety, meeting international DOT standards and ensuring optimal braking performance in all weather conditions.
home_p_27: All our products are imported directly from Germany and meet international ISO and API standards. We work only with recognized manufacturers with global reputation.
home_p_28: Efficient distribution network ensuring fast delivery to any point in Cyprus. High inventory availability and excellent customer service.
home_p_29: Expert team available for consultation and guidance in selecting the most suitable products for your vehicle. Personal and professional service.
home_p_30: Direct import from manufacturer allows us to offer attractive prices without compromising on quality. Special offers for bulk purchases.
home_p_31: We offer a comprehensive product line covering all maintenance needs of your vehicle
home_p_32: Perfect protection for the cooling system in all seasons
home_p_33: For smooth and responsive steering system
home_p_34: For a wide range of technical applications in vehicles
home_p_35: For a wide range of technical applications in vehicles
home_p_36: Contact us today and receive professional consultation and a personalized quote. We are here to help you choose the most suitable oils for your vehicle.

about_h1_1: About Y.N.K logos consulting & Services Ltd
about_h2_9: Want to Join Our Customer Family?
about_p_22: Y.N.K logos consulting & Services Ltd was established with a clear vision - to bring the highest quality automotive oils to the Cypriot market, combined with professional service and competitive prices. We specialize in importing automotive oils to Cyprus directly from the manufacturer in Germany. The highest quality automotive oils, combined with professional service and competitive prices. We specialize in importing automotive oils to Cyprus directly from the manufacturer in Germany, and provide comprehensive solutions for all maintenance needs of light and heavy vehicle owners.
about_p_23: Over the years, we have built a reputation for reliability and excellence in the field of German automotive oils. We are proud to have become the preferred supplier for garages, transport companies, fleet owners and private vehicle owners throughout Cyprus. Our success stems from our unwavering commitment to quality, excellent service and customer satisfaction.
about_p_24: To provide garage owners in Cyprus with access to German quality oils and maintenance products, while maintaining fair prices and professional service. We are committed to being the most reliable partner for all vehicle maintenance needs, and to ensure that every customer receives the exact product for their needs.
about_p_25: To be the leading and most reliable company in the field of importing and marketing engine oils in Cyprus. We strive to expand our product range, continuously improve our service level and continue building long-term relationships with our customers, based on trust, reliability and excellence.
about_p_26: We insist on excellent quality in every product we supply. All our oils meet the strictest international standards and are imported directly from a German brand.
about_p_27: We build our relationships with customers on the basis of mutual trust, complete transparency and commitment to keeping our promises. Our word is your guarantee.
about_p_28: We believe in personal service and full accessibility to customers. Our team of experts is always available for consultation, guidance and providing customized solutions.
about_p_29: We are always looking for new ways to improve our service, expand our product range and adapt ourselves to the changing needs of the market.
about_p_30: We are aware of the importance of environmental protection and ensure to supply environmentally friendly products that meet the strictest emission standards.
about_p_31: We believe in providing real value to our customers - fair prices, quality products and excellent service.
about_p_32: Our specialization in oils for light and heavy vehicles in Cyprus is based on years of rich experience in the industry and a deep understanding of the unique needs of the local market. We know in depth the road conditions, climate and vehicle usage in Cyprus, and adapt our products accordingly.
about_p_33: Our team includes experts with extensive knowledge in the field of oils, maintenance and vehicle mechanics. We continuously follow technological developments in the automotive industry, and ensure that we always offer the most advanced and suitable solutions to our customers.
about_p_34: We are proud of our strategic partnerships with the German Maximum brand. Our direct connections with the factory allow us to guarantee excellent quality, high availability and competitive prices. We work only with manufacturers with a global reputation, whose products meet the strictest international quality standards and the standards of the world's leading car manufacturers.
about_p_35: In addition to partnerships with the manufacturer, we maintain close relationships with garages, transport companies and fleet owners throughout Cyprus. These relationships allow us to better understand market needs, receive continuous feedback and continuously improve our service and products.
about_p_36: Every product we supply has undergone rigorous testing and meets international quality standards and the standards of the world's leading car manufacturers. We stand behind the quality of our products and guarantee complete satisfaction.
about_p_37: We maintain a large inventory of all products and guarantee fast delivery throughout Cyprus. High availability and reliable service - always.
about_p_38: Our team of experts is available for professional consultation, guidance and providing customized solutions. We are here to help you choose the best products for your vehicle.
about_p_39: We are always looking for ways to improve our service, expand our product range, and adapt to our customers' changing needs.
about_p_40: We invite you to get to know Y.N.K logos consulting & Services Ltd and experience for yourself the service and quality that have made us leaders in the field. Contact us today.

services_h1_1: Sales of German Maximum Brand Oils and Professional Maintenance
services_h2_8: Why Choose Y.N.K for Car Oils?
services_h2_9: Need Advice on Choosing the Right Oil?
services_p_19: Y.N.K logos consulting & Services Ltd specializes in car oil import Cyprus and offers a comprehensive range of maintenance solutions for private and heavy vehicle owners. We are proud to be a leading supplier of German Maximum brand oils of the highest quality, imported directly from our factory.
services_p_20: Our expertise in oils is based on years of experience in the industry and deep understanding of local market needs. We offer oils that meet the strictest international standards and provide excellent performance in all road and climate conditions.
services_p_21: We supply a wide range of synthetic and semi-synthetic engine oils for private cars and SUVs. All our products meet the strictest ACEA and API standards and are approved by leading car manufacturers worldwide. Our oils ensure maximum engine protection and reduce wear.
services_p_22: Our products include oils in various viscosity grades (0W-20, 5W-30, 5W-40, 10W-40 and more) suitable for all engine types - gasoline, diesel, turbo and hybrid. We also offer special oils for sports cars and high-performance vehicles.
services_p_23: Our special expertise is in supplying oils for light and heavy vehicles Cyprus, including trucks, buses, tractors and heavy equipment. We offer engine oils with high resistance to heavy loads, extreme temperatures and harsh working conditions.
services_p_24: Our heavy vehicle oils meet Euro VI standards and are suitable for modern diesel engines with advanced emission control systems. We also supply oils for agricultural equipment, forklifts and construction machinery, with precise adaptation to manufacturer requirements and usage conditions.
services_p_25: Complete range of oils for automatic transmissions (ATF), manual (MTF) and differential. Our oils ensure smooth power transmission, reduce noise and extend transmission life. We offer products adapted to all transmission types - conventional, CVT, DSG and advanced automatic transmissions.
services_p_26: Additionally, we supply special oils for heavy and commercial vehicle transmissions, including oils with high resistance to pressure and high temperatures. All our products meet GL-4, GL-5 standards and specific manufacturer requirements.
services_p_27: Vehicle safety is our top priority, which is why we offer only the highest quality brake fluids. Our products meet DOT 3 and DOT 4 standards and are suitable for all brake system types - conventional, ABS, ESP and advanced electronic braking systems.
services_p_28: We also supply hydraulic oils for power steering systems, hydraulic suspensions and hydraulic systems in heavy machinery. Our fluids ensure optimal performance across the entire temperature range, high resistance to oxidation and wear, and full compatibility with all system components.
services_p_29: Quality fluids for hydraulic steering systems, ensuring smooth, responsive and noise-free steering.
services_p_30: All our products are imported directly from the German Maximum manufacturer, without intermediaries. This ensures excellent quality and competitive prices.
services_p_31: All our oils meet ISO, API, ACEA standards and leading car manufacturer requirements. We perform rigorous testing on every product.
services_p_32: We maintain large inventory of all products and guarantee fast delivery throughout Cyprus. High availability and reliable service.
services_p_33: Our team of experts is at your service for consultation and guidance in selecting the most suitable products for your vehicle. Personal and professional service.
services_p_34: Our direct import and large purchase volumes allow us to offer particularly competitive prices, without compromising on quality.
services_p_35: We offer special discounts for bulk purchases, to garages, transport companies and fleet owners. Preferred terms for business customers.
services_p_36: Our team of experts will be happy to help you choose the most suitable products for your vehicle. Contact us today and receive a personalized quote.
services_p_37: © 2026 Y.N.K logos consulting & Services Ltd. All rights reserved.
